message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to meet your specific needs and provide exceptional value. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, we're confident it will be a great addition to your collection. We're willing to extend this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9500.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing. After considering my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While we understand your budget constraints, we believe in maintaining fair pricing for our products. We would like to counter your offer with a price of $9000 for the product. This price still reflects the value and quality of our product, while being more accessible to your current financial situation.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to accommodate my budget. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8750 for the product.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your patience and understanding. In light of our discussions, we would like to counter your offer with a price of $8900 for the product. This price aims to balance our business interests with your financial considerations.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I've considered your proposal and would like to make a final counteroffer of $8800 for the product.

Thank you for your final counteroffer, Bob. We've carefully evaluated your proposal and decided to counter it with an offer of $8850 for the product. We believe this price reflects the value of our product while remaining within your budget.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've given it careful consideration and would like to propose a final counteroffer of $8700 for the product.

Thank you for your last counteroffer, Bob. After reviewing your proposal, we have decided to offer the product to you for $8750. We hope this price will be acceptable to you and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
